alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SCREVEN, EFFINGHAM, BEAUFORT, HAMPTON, COLLETON, ALLENDALE AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 415 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Hunters to near Garnett to Ebenezer, and moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Ridgeland, Allendale, Hampton, Yemassee, Lake Warren State Park, Varnville, Estill and Fairfax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper
